text: junimkkeseo neohui baegseong gaunde seo han salam-eul tonghayeo neohuiege mesejileul bonae neohuileul gyeong-goham-i nol laun il-ilan mal-inyo noaui baegseong ol myeolmangkehan hu neohuiga ileul gyeseungtolog hago neohuiege him-eul deohan hananim-ui eunhyeleul saeng-gaghala neohuiegebepul-eojin hananim-ui eunhyeleul suggohalttae neohuineun beonseonghalila
